src:
Napolijeva poslednja šansa
Za tim Karla Ančelotija, posle dva uzastopna remija, pobeda na Olimpiku je pod obavezno, ako želi da i dalje gaji nade da može da ostane u trci za Skudeto

02 Nov 2019


(Od dopisnika MOZZART Sporta iz Rima) 

Jedanaesto kolo Serije A počinje najzanimljivijim i najvažnijim mečom: Roma - Napoli. Za tim Karla Ančelotija, posle dva uzastopna remija, pobeda na Olimpiku je pod obavezno, ako želi da i dalje gaji nade da može da ostane u trci za Skudeto. Đalorosi, sa svoje strane, žele da uknjiže treću uzastopnu pobedu i da pobegnu na četiri boda Azurima. Antonio Konte ima nameru da odmori nekoliko svojih igrača protiv Bolonje pošto Inter sledeće nedelje čeka odlučujući meč sa Borusijom Dortmund za plasman u osminu finala Lige šampiona. Siniša Mihajlović će posmatrati svoje momke preko televizora i pokušaće posle razbijanja tabua Ranijerija (nikada ga nije pobedio do prošle nedelje) da razreši još jedan: Bolonja na Dal’Ari nije pobedila Inter od 2002. godine. Pred derbi u Torinu sve ide na stranu Juvea: od statistike, Torino je pobedio samo jednom u poslednjih, gotovo, četvrt veka, do činjenice da Macari ne može da računa na Nkulua, Jaga Falkea i Rinkona, a Sariju se vraćaju na raspolaganje svi igrači osim Kjelinija i “pocrvenelog” Rabioa. 

ROMA - NAPOLI 

Roma je vezala dve izuzetno važne pobede u poslednja dva kola protiv Milana i Udinezea, ali je u poslednje tri godine redovno gubila dvoboje sa Napolijem na Olimpijskom stadionu. Na ruku Đalorosih ide i činjenica da su na poslednjih 19 utakmica na svom stadionu izgubili samo jednom. Takođe, Roma je sa Paulom Fonsekom na klupi izgubila samo jednom: reč je o istom meču, protiv Atalante pre mesec dana. Paradoksalno, serija povreda koja je zadesila Đalorose primorala je Fonseku da promeni sistem igre i pruži šansu igračima za koje se mislilo da su potpuno izgubljeni, poput Pastorea, delimično kao Klajvert ili da su u stalnom traženju sebe kao Zaniolo. Njima treba dodati i Spinacolu i Veretua koji nisu baš najbolje počeli sezonu. 
Jedina novina u sastavu Rome za današnji meč u odnosu na onaj koji smo videli u Udinama je u defanzivnoj liniji i to samo zato što je Facio dobio crveni karton protiv Udinezea i ne može da igra. Fonseka je stavio do znanja da nema nameru da menja formaciju 4-1-4-1 koja se pokazala kao veoma solidna u odbrani i efikasna u napadu. To znači da će Mančini, uprkos odsustvu bivšeg igrača Sevilje,  igrati u novoj ulozi između defanzivne i vezne linije, kao Desai u Kapelovom Milanu ili Kouto u Eriksonovom Laciju. Od povrede se oporavio Huan Žesus i sada je na kormilaru Rome da odluči kome će pokloniti poverenje: iskusnom, ali nepouzdanom Brazilcu ili Turčinu Četinu za koga bi to bila prva utakmica u Seriji A u startnoj postavi Rome. Under će, po svoj prilici, čekati na klupi šansu da uđe na teren zajedno sa Perotijem. Van stroja su i dalje Mhitarjan, Pelegrini, Dijavara, Kristante, Kalinić, Zapakosta. 
Roma 4-1-4-1: Lopez; Spinacola, Četin (Huan Žesus), Smoling, Kolarov; Mančini; Zaniolo, Pastore, Veretu, Klajvert; Džeko. 
Napoli dolazi na Olimpiko sa dva uzastopna remija u prvenstvu koji su prilično smanjili šanse Ančelotijevog tima da učestvuje u trci za Skudeto. Utakmica protiv Rome je poslednji voz za Napoli da ne izgubi iz vida Juventus i Inter. Svaki rezultat osim pobede za Azure ne bi samo značio adio šampionskim snovima nego bi neizbežno otvorio i trku za treće, a ne samo za četvrto mesto na tabeli. Pre početka šampionata svi su davali Juve, Inter i Napoli kao sigurna tri učesnika u sledećem izdanju Lige šampiona. Posle četvrtine prvenstva Serije A, Napolijeva pozicija nije više tako sigurna. 
Napoli je u poslednje tri godine redovno odnosio ceo plen sa Olimpika i morali bismo da se vratimo u 2014. godinu, u Benitezovu eru, pa da nađemo tri vezane utakmice u kojima je Napoli ostao bez pobede u Seriji A. 
Napoli se žalio na odluku Disciplinske komisije da suspenduje Karla Ančelotija na jednu utakmicu i nada se da će žalba biti usvojena te da će Ančeloti voditi tim sa klupe na Olimpiku. U suprotnom, Napolijem će komandovati njegov sin Davide, s oca na sina, bila bi to apsolutno primicija u najvažnijoj sporednoj stvari na svetu. 
Napoli je na meču sa Atalantom izgubio Alana, ali se zato u tim vratio Manolas koji bi mogao ovog popodneva prvi put da igra protiv svog bivšeg kluba. Biće neizvesno do kraja da li će izbor pasti na rovitog Manolasa ili na našeg Maksimovića koji se takođe oporavio od povrede pre samo pet dana. Nije još uvek izvesno ni ko će biti na poziciji levog beka: Luperto ili Mario Rui. Mertens bi trebalo da se vrati među startere jer je Olimpiko stadion na kome pruža svoje najbolje partije dok je Milik prilično siguran za svoje mesto budući da je zatresao četiri puta mrežu na poslednja tri meča Serije A.
Napoli 4-4-2: Meret; Di Lorenco, Manolas, Kulibali, Mario Rui; Kaljehon, Zjelinski, Fabijan Ruiz, Insinje; Mertens, Milik. 

BOLONJA - INTER 

Siniša Mihajlović je počeo svoju drugu avanturu na klupi Bolonje pobedom nad Interom, ali na San Siru i na klupi Nerazura tada je sedeo Lučano Spaleti. Na Dal’Ari Bolonja ne zna za pobedu protiv Intera već 17 godina. Poslednji put se tim iz Emilije radovao pobedi nad Nerazurima na svom stadionu 2002. godine . 
Veoma pozitivna vest za Mihu i njegovog zamenika Tanjgu, koji će voditi tim sa klupe, je povratak Medela na raspolaganje. Ako Pitbul ne bude spreman za 90 minuta, tu je Svanberg, kao alternativa. Osim Čileanca, još jedan bivši igrač Intera će biti oran za duel: Palasio. Argentinac je bio delimično pošteđen na meču sa Kaljarijem i večeras će biti na terenu od prvog sudijskog zvižduka. Bolonja i dalje ne može da računa na Tomijasua, Dajksa i Destra. 
Bolonja 4-2-3-1: Skorupski; Mbaje, Danilo, Densvil, Krejči; Poli, Medel; Orsolini, Sorijano, Sansone; Palasio. 
Inter nije nikada bolje startovao u prvenstvu u svojoj istoriji: osam pobeda, remi i poraz. Takođe se nikada nije dogodilo da Nerazuri zatresu mrežu na svih 13 utakmica na startu sezone (uključujući i Ligu šampiona), dok bi, ako pobede i večeras, prvi put u svojoj istoriji vezali šest uzastopnih pobeda na gostovanjima u Seriji A. 
Antonio Konte mora da misli i na meč sa Borusijom iz Dortmunda u sledećoj nedelji koji će odlučivati direktno ko će u osminu finala Lige šampiona. Zato je malo verovatno da ćemo videti Sensija od prvog minuta na Dal’Ari iako se vezni igrač vratio u grupu i obavio je ceo trening juče u Apijano Đentileu. Zbog meča u Ligi šampiona vrlo je verovatno da u Bolonji dobiju mali predah Kandreva i Godin dok je Asamoa primoran da preskoči meč zbog lakše povrede kolena. Austrijanac, afro-grčkog porekla, Lazaro bi trebalo da dobije šansu od prvog minuta. Bivši igrač Herte je propustio prve dve prilike koje je dobio protiv Slavije u Ligi šampiona i Sasuola u Seriji A, i ovo bi mogla da bude poslednja šansa da sačuva mesto u Interu, odnosno da ne bude poslat na pozajmicu u januaru. Umesto Godina, koga Konte želi svežeg i spremnog za Dortmund, igraće Bastoni. 
Inter 3-5-2: Handanović; Škrinjar, De Fraj, Bastoni; Lacari, Galjardini, Brozović, Barela, Biragi; Lukaku, Lautaru Martinez. 

TORINO - JUVENTUS

Derbi dolazi u najnepovoljnijem momentu za Torino. Otkad je Urbano Kairo preuzeo Torino, Granate su samo jednom počeli gore sezonu. Reč je o šampionatu  2008/2009, Torino je tada izgubio šest od prvih 10 mečeva i na kraju te godine, što je zabrinjavajući signal za Toro, ispao je iz Serije A. To se ovoga puta neće dogoditi jer Torino ima dovoljno jak tim da obezbedi prvoligaški status, problem za Macarija je što Kairo veruje da mu je obezbedio tim kadar da se plasira u Ligu šampiona. 
Macarijev zadatak da spasi svoju klupu proitv Juvea ima ukus nemoguće misije jer je Torino uspeo samo jednom da pobedi Juve u poslednjih 26 derbija. Drugi balast za Macarija je što neće moći da pošalje na teren Nkulua (suspendovan zbog crvenog kartona protiv Lacija). Priliku da zaigra na Nkuluovom mestu bi mogao da dobije Brazilac našeg porekla Lijanko dok bi i Lukić trebalo da bude potvrđen u startnoj postavi pošto je Rinkon i dalje povređen. Problem za kormilara Torina je i nova povreda Jaga Falkea. Španca će zameniti Verdi. 
Torino 3-5-2: Sirigu; Ico, Lijanko, Điđi; De Silvestri, Bazeli, Lukić, Meite, Ansaldi; Verdi, Beloti. 
Svi brojevi su na strani Juvea a uz to u tim su se vratili i svi povređeni igrači, osim Kjelinija dok će nedostajati još samo Rabio, pocrveneo protiv Đenove. Bjankoneri ne igraju lepršavo, spektakularno i efikasno kako se očekivalo i zbog čega je Sari anagažovan, ali je Juve jedini neporaženi tim u Evropi i od Sarija je bolji start imao samo Fabio Kapelo. 
Na raspolaganje Sariju se vraćaju Pjanić i De Šiljo dok su Remzi i Daglas Kosta već odigrali nekoliko minuta protiv Đenove tako da bi mogli da se nađu od prvog minuta na terenu, posebno Remzi. Za stratega Juvea je od fundamentalnog značaja je povatak Pjanića bez koga Juveova igra gubi prilično na maštovitosti i raznovrsnosti. Među startere bi trebalo da se vrati i De Liht pošto Rugani, kao i Demiral ranije, nije uspeo da se nametne kao adekvatna alternativa. 
Juve 4-3-1-2: Ščešni; Kvadrado, Bonuči, De Liht, Aleks Sandro ( De Šiljo); Emre Dž, Pjanić, Matuidi; Bernardeski (Remzi); Dibala, Ronaldo

NAPOMENA: Kvote su podložne promenama
text:
The last chance comes
For Carl Ancelotti's team, after two consecutive draws, winning the Olympics is a must if he wants to continue to have hopes that he can stay in the race for Scudetto

02 Nov 2019


(From MOZZART Sport correspondent from Rome)

The eleventh round of Serie A starts with the most interesting and important match: Roma - Napoli. For Carl Ancelotti's team, after two consecutive draws, winning the Olympics is a must if he wants to continue to harbor hopes that he can stay in the race for Scudetto. The Djaloros, for their part, want to book a third consecutive win and escape by four points to the Azurites. Antonio Konte is set to rest several of his players against Bologna as Inter awaits a decisive match with Borussia Dortmund next week to qualify for the eighth Champions League final. Sinisa Mihajlovic will be watching his guys on TV and will try to break another taboo after breaking the taboo of Ranieri (he never beat him until last week): Bologna at Dal'Ari has not beaten Inter since 2002. Before the Turin derby, everything goes to Juve's side: from statistics, Turin has only won once in the last, almost a quarter of a century, to the fact that Macari cannot count on Nkulu, Jago Falke and Rinkon, and all players are back at Sari except Kelini and the "blushing" Rabio.

ROMA - HALF

Roma have tied two extremely important victories in the last two rounds against Milan and Udinese, but have lost duels with Napoli at the Olympic Stadium in the last three years. The fact that they have lost only one in their last 19 games at their stadium also goes to the hands of the Gialoros. Also, Roma lost with Paul Fonsek only once on the bench: it was the same match against Atalanta a month ago. Paradoxically, the injury series that plagued Djalorose forced Fonseka to change the game system and give players a chance to think they were completely lost, like Pastore, partly like Clyvert, or in constant search for themselves as Zaniolo. They should also be added to Spinacola and Veretua, who didn't start the season very well.
The only novelty in the Roma squad for today's match compared to the one we saw in Udine is in the defensive line, only because Facio has been awarded a red card against Udinese and cannot play. Fonseka made it clear that he had no intention of changing the 4-1-4-1 formation which proved to be very solid on defense and effective in attack. This means that despite the absence of a former Sevilla player, Mancini will play a new role between the defensive and midfielder, like Desai in Capel Milan or Kouto in Erikson's Lazio. He has recovered from his injury and is now on the helm of Rome to decide who to give his trust to: an experienced but unreliable Brazilian or Turkish Chetin for whom would be the first Serie A match in the Roma starting lineup. Under will likely be waiting on the bench for a chance to get on the pitch with Perot. Mhitarjan, Pelegrini, Diavara, Kristante, Kalinić, Zapakosta are still out of the machine.
Roma 4-1-4-1: Lopez; Spinacola, Chetin (Juan Jesus), Smoling, Kolarov; Mancini; Zaniolo, Pastor, Veretu, Clyvert; Dzeko.
Napoli are coming to Olympic with two consecutive championship draws, which greatly reduced the chances of Ancelotti's team participating in the race for Skudeto. The match against Rome is the last train for Napoli not to lose sight of Juventus and Inter. Any result other than winning the Azure would not only mean adio to the championship dreams but would inevitably open the race to third, not just fourth in the standings. Prior to the start of the championship, everyone gave Juve, Inter and Napoli a safe three entrants in the next edition of the Champions League. After a quarter of the Serie A championships, Napoli's position is no longer so secure.
For the past three years, Napoli has been regularly releasing all the spoils from the Olympics, and we would have to go back to 2014, the Benitez era, to find three tied games in which Napoli lost without a Serie A victory.
Napoli has appealed the decision of the Disciplinary Board to suspend Carl Ancelotti for one game and hopes that the appeal will be upheld and that Ancelotti will lead the team from the bench to Olympique. Otherwise, Napoli would be commanded by his son David, father to son, it would be absolutely primacy in the most important side matter in the world.
Napoli lost Alan in the match with Atalanta, but this is why Manolas, who could play for the first time against his former club, returned to the team this afternoon. It will be uncertain until the end whether the choice will fall to the roving Manolas or our Maksimovic, who also recovered from his injury just five days ago. It is not yet certain who will be in left-back position: Luperto or Mario Rui. Mertens should return among the starters as Olympic is the stadium where he delivers his best games, while Milik is pretty sure of his place as he has shaken four times in the last three Serie A matches.
Napoli 4-4-2: Meret; Di Lorenzo, Manolas, Kulibali, Mario Rui; Callahon, Zelinsky, Fabian Ruiz, Insinje; Mertens, Milik.

BOLONJA - INTER

Sinisa Mihajlovic began his second adventure on the Bologna bench with a win over Inter, but then Lucan Spaleti sat at San Siro and the Nerazur bench. At Dal'Ari, Bologna has not known about winning against Inter Milan for 17 years. The last time a team from Emilia looked forward to winning the Nerazur at their stadium in 2002.
Very positive news for Micah and his deputy Tanjgu, who will lead the team from the bench, is the return of Medell to his disposal. If Pitbull isn't ready in 90 minutes, there's Svanberg, as an alternative. In addition to the Chilean, another former Inter player will be plowed for a duel: Palasio. The Argentine was partially spared in the match against Cagliari and will be on the field tonight since the referee's first whistle. Bologna still cannot count on Tommyasu, Dyke and Destra.
Bologna 4-2-3-1: Skorupski; Mbaje, Danilo, Densville, Krejci; Poly, Medell; Orsolini, Soriano, Sansone; Palasio.
Inter have never started better in a championship in their history: eight wins, a draw and a defeat. It also never happened that Nerazuri shook the net in all 13 games at the start of the season (including the Champions League), and if they won tonight they would have tied six consecutive Serie A away games for the first time in their history.
Antonio Konte has to think of a match with Borussia Dortmund next week, who will decide directly who will make it to the eighth Champions League final. That is why it is unlikely that we will see Sensi from the first minute on Dal'Ari even though the midfielder returned to the group and did his entire training yesterday at Apiano Gentile. Due to the Champions League match, it is very likely that Bologna will get a small break from Kandreva and Godin, while Asamoa is forced to skip the match due to a minor knee injury. An Austrian, of Afro-Greek descent, Lazaro should get a chance from the first minute. The former Herte player missed the first two opportunities he won against Slavia in the Champions League and Sasuol in Serie A, and this could be the last chance to save a place in Inter, or not to be sent on loan in January. Instead of Years, whom Konte wants fresh and ready for Dortmund, Bastoni will play.
Inter 3-5-2: Handanovic; Skrinjar, De Fry, Bastoni; Lacari, Gallardini, Brozovic, Barela, Biragi; Lukaku, Lautaru Martinez.

TORINO - JUVENTUS

The derby comes at a most embarrassing moment for Turin. Ever since Urban Cairo took over Turin, the Grenades have only started the season up once. It's about the 2008/2009 championship, Turin then lost six of their first 10 matches and at the end of that year, a worrying signal for Toro, dropped out of Serie A. That won't happen this time because Turin has a strong enough team to secure first league status, the problem for Macari is that Cairo believes he has secured him the team to qualify for the Champions League.
Macari's quest to save his bench proitv Juve tastes like an impossible mission as Turin has only managed to beat Juve once in the last 26 derbies. Another ballast for Macari is that he will not be able to send Nkulu to the field (suspended for a red card against Lazio). An opportunity to play at Nkulu's place could be given by our Brazilian origin Lijanko, while Lukic should be confirmed in the starting lineup as Rinkon is still injured. The problem for helmsman Turin is also Jag Falke's new injury. The Spaniard will replace Verdi.
Turin 3-5-2: Sirigu; Ico, Lijanko, Jiji; De Silvestri, Basel, Lukic, Meite, Ansaldi; Verdi, Beloti.
All the numbers are on Juve's side, with all the injured players returning to the team, except for Gelini, while only Rabio, blushed against Genoa, will be missing. The Bianconeri do not play as fluttering, spectacular and efficient as expected and why Sari is engaged, but Juve is the only undefeated team in Europe and Fabio Kapelo has had a better start than Sari.
Parić and De Siljo are back at Sari's disposal, while Remzi and Douglas Costa have already played minutes against Genoa so that they can find themselves from the first minute on the court, especially Remzi. Of fundamental importance to the Juve strategist is Pjanić's return without which Juve's game loses much to imagination and variety. De Licht should return among the starters as Rugani, like Demiral before, failed to impose himself as an adequate alternative.
Juve 4-3-1-2: Cheeky; Quadrado, Bonucci, De Licht, Alex Sandro (De Siljo); Emre Dz, Pjanic, Matuidi; Bernardeski (Remzi); Dibala, Ronaldo
